hero.subtitle: Saving together, growing together
hero.description: Volcan d’Or is a mobile application that enables Moroccan and MENA families to create dedicated savings portfolios for their children or family goals, as well as to participate in 100% digital, secure, and automated tontine cycles (Daret).

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Volcan d’Or is a mobile application developed by the Moroccan startup Technologies d'Or, founded to create inclusive digital solutions with a strong social impact.

services.description: Volcan d’Or is an innovative mobile application dedicated to family and community savings. It helps Moroccan and MENA region families secure their children’s future and achieve their financial goals through two main services.
services.portfolios_desc: Dedicated savings portfolios for each child or family goal.
services.point1: Create a savings portfolio for each child or goal
services.point2: Set an amount, duration, and saving frequency
services.point3: Top up your Wallet with local payment methods
services.point4: Funds are automatically transferred to each portfolio
services.point5: Track your savings growth in real time
services.tontine_desc: Modern Daret cycles (tontines) between friends, families, colleagues, or users.
services.tontine_point1: Create your own Daret or join existing ones
services.tontine_point2: Select your receiving order in the cycle
services.tontine_point3: Pay your contributions on time via your rechargeable Wallet
services.tontine_point4: Receive your Round directly into your bank account

innovation.social_network_desc: Users can post, comment, like, share, and repost like on a social network. A real saving community is built to foster mutual support and financial inspiration.
innovation.ai_assistant_desc: AI d’Or is a built-in intelligent assistant based on artificial intelligence. It answers by voice or text, advises on the best saving strategies depending on profiles, and simplifies app usage.
innovation.wallet_desc: The integrated Wallet allows easy top-ups via bank card, Chaabi Cash, etc. It is used to pay Daret contributions and transfer funds to savings portfolios.
innovation.security_desc: Through integration with Wraqi.ma for legalized contract signing, NFC or ID verification, and secure storage, Volcan d’Or guarantees a safe experience for all users.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.desc: To make saving simple, accessible, and secure for everyone, relying on technology and the local culture of solidarity.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.desc: To build a safer future for future generations through digital saving solutions tailored to the needs of Moroccan and African families.

financial_security.title: Financial Security
financial_security.desc: Your funds are protected and locked until the chosen date

ease_of_use.title: Easy to use
ease_of_use.desc: Just a few clicks from your mobile

inclusive.title: Inclusive
inclusive.desc: Accessible even without a bank account

saida.name: Saida El Idrissi
saida.text: Thanks to Volcan d’Or, I managed to save every month for my son’s education. The app is clear, simple, and reassuring.

monir.name: Mounir Nassiri
monir.text: I’ve been in a Daret for 6 months, everything is automated. No stress, no forgetfulness!

secured_funds.a: Yes. Funds are stored in partner bank accounts and your data is encrypted.

how_daret_works.a: Each member pays a monthly contribution. At each Round, one member receives the total amount.

who_can_use.a: Anyone residing in Morocco or a MENA country. All you need is a phone and an ID card.

footer.company_description: is an innovative mobile application dedicated to family and community savings.
